channel.title: Posts on Anders E. Vrålstad Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Anders E. Vrålstad Portfolio

item.title: Preprint of "Coherence Based Sound Speed Aberration Correction"
item.description:
My thrid paper for my PhD is called “Coherence Based Sound Speed Aberration Correction — with clinical validation in obstetric ultrasound”. A preprint of the paper is found on arXiv.

Read more about it on the project page.

item.title: Sound Speed and Virtual Source Correction in Synthetic Transmit Focusing
item.description:
My first paper for my PhD is called “Sound Speed and Virtual Source Correction in Synthetic Transmit Focusing” and is published in IEEE Open Journal of Ultrasonics, Ferroelectrics, and Frequency Control (Volume 4).

Read the open-access article here.

item.title: Universal REFoCUS Beamforming With Spatial Weighting
item.description:
My second paper for my PhD is called “Universal REFoCUS Beamforming With Spatial Weighting” and is published in IEEE Open Journal of Ultrasonics, Ferroelectrics, and Frequency Control (Volume 4).

Read the open-access article here.
